text: Sir David Lean (25 March 1908 â€“ 16 April 1991) was a British movie director. He was born in Croydon, Surrey. He directed Dr Zhivago, Lawrence of Arabia and The Bridge on the River Kwai. He died in Limehouse, east London. == Other websites == * Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:British movie editors Category:English movie directors Category:English movie producers Category:English screenwriters Category:Golden Globe Award winning directors Category:Writers from Surrey Category:People from Croydon Category:1908 births Category:1991 deaths
